description.en: Here you will learn the names of places in the beauty industry in English such as "salon", "massage parlor", and "barbershop".
description.id: Di sini Anda akan mempelajari nama -nama tempat di industri kecantikan dalam bahasa Inggris seperti "salon", "ruang pijat", dan "pangkas".

en.long: a shop where a barber works and men can get haircuts

id.long: Toko tempat seorang tukang cukur bekerja dan pria bisa mendapatkan potongan rambut

en.long: a place where hairdressing, makeup and other cosmetic services are done professionally

id.long: Tempat di mana tata rambut, riasan dan layanan kosmetik lainnya dilakukan secara profesional

en.long: a place where people are trained in order to cut hair, do makeup, etc. professionally

id.long: tempat di mana orang dilatih untuk memotong rambut, melakukan riasan, dll. Secara profesional

en.long: a place where a person can have their make-up done or receive hair, face, etc. treatments to look more attractive

id.long: Tempat di mana seseorang dapat melakukan make-up atau menerima perawatan rambut, wajah, dll. agar terlihat lebih menarik

en.long: a shop or business offering specific goods or services

id.long: toko atau bisnis yang menawarkan barang atau jasa tertentu

en.long: a salon offering various personal care services such as hairstyling, makeup, skincare, and nail treatments

id.long: Salon yang menawarkan berbagai layanan perawatan pribadi seperti gaya rambut, makeup, perawatan kulit, dan perawatan kuku

en.long: a retail establishment that sells cosmetic and personal care products, often including makeup, skincare, haircare, and fragrance items

id.long: Perusahaan ritel yang menjual produk perawatan kosmetik dan pribadi, seringkali termasuk makeup, perawatan kulit, perawatan rambut, dan item wewangian

en.long: a facility where individuals can receive professional massages for relaxation, stress relief, and therapeutic purposes

id.long: Fasilitas di mana individu dapat menerima pijat profesional untuk relaksasi, menghilangkan stres, dan tujuan terapeutik

en.long: a commercial establishment that offers a range of services related to health, beauty, and relaxation, such as massages, facials, saunas, and hot tubs

id.long: Sebuah tempat komersial yang menawarkan berbagai layanan yang terkait dengan kesehatan, keindahan, dan relaksasi, seperti pijat, facial, sauna, dan bak mandi air panas

en.long: a business establishment that offers services for nail care, including manicures, pedicures, nail enhancements, and nail art

id.long: Sebuah perusahaan bisnis yang menawarkan layanan untuk perawatan kuku, termasuk manikur, pedikur, peningkatan kuku, dan seni kuku

en.long: a trendy and modern establishment that offers nail care services, including manicures, pedicures, nail enhancements, and nail art, in a social and relaxed atmosphere

id.long: Perusahaan yang trendi dan modern yang menawarkan layanan perawatan kuku, termasuk manikur, pedikur, peningkatan kuku, dan seni kuku, dalam suasana sosial dan santai
